pages.text: Reduces spell cooldown and mana costs by 15% each. This modifier is unique to the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/witches_orb)Witches Orb$(), to obtain it you must craft your orb using the appropriate aspect gem.

pages.mod_text: The orb crackles with energy that it shares with the caster and magic flowing through them. Appears on a Witches Orb if crafted with the proper gem.
